cn.crowdos.kernel.resource

接口 Task

  • 所有超级接口:
    Decomposable<Task>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractTask, SimpleTask

    public interface Task
extends Decomposable<Task>

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  Task.TaskDistributionType 
      static class  Task.TaskStatus 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean assignable()
      Returns true if the type is assignable to the type of the given object.
      boolean canAssignTo(Participant participant)
      Returns true if the given participant can be assigned to this role.
      List<Constraint> constraints()
      Returns a list of constraints that are applied to the field.
      boolean finished()
      Returns true if the game is over, false otherwise.
      Task.TaskDistributionType getTaskDistributionType()
      Returns the type of task distribution used in the simulation
      Task.TaskStatus getTaskStatus()
      Returns the status of the task.
      void setTaskStatus(Task.TaskStatus status)
      Sets the status of the task to the given status.

        decomposer

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTaskDistributionType

        Task.TaskDistributionType getTaskDistributionType()
        Returns the type of task distribution used in the simulation
        返回:
        The task distribution type.

      • getTaskStatus

        Task.TaskStatus getTaskStatus()
        Returns the status of the task.
        返回:
        The task status is being returned.

      • setTaskStatus

        void setTaskStatus(Task.TaskStatus status)
        Sets the status of the task to the given status.
        参数:
        status - The status of the task.

      • constraints

        List<Constraint> constraints()
        Returns a list of constraints that are applied to the field.
        返回:
        A list of constraints.

      • canAssignTo

        boolean canAssignTo(Participant participant)
        Returns true if the given participant can be assigned to this role.
        参数:
        participant - The participant to assign the task to.
        返回:
        A boolean value.

      • assignable

        boolean assignable()
        Returns true if the type is assignable to the type of the given object.
        返回:
        A boolean value.

      • finished

        boolean finished()
        Returns true if the game is over, false otherwise.
        返回:
        A boolean value.
